section.p: A Medication Activity describes substance administrations that have actually occurred (e.g., pills ingested or injections given) or are intended to occur (e.g., "take 2 tablets twice a day for the next 10 days"). Medication activities in "INT" mood are reflections of what a clinician intends a patient to be taking. For example, a clinician may intend that a patient to be administered Lisinopril 20 mg PO for blood pressure control. If what was actually administered was Lisinopril 10 mg., then the Medication activities in the "EVN" mood would reflect actual use. A moodCode of INT is allowed, but it is recommended that the Planned Medication Activity (V2) template be used for moodCodes other than EVN if the document type contains a section that includes Planned Medication Activity (V2) (for example a Care Plan document with Plan of Treatment, Intervention, or Goal sections). At a minimum, a Medication Activity shall include an effectiveTime indicating the duration of the administration (or single-administration timestamp). Ambulatory medication lists generally provide a summary of use for a given medication over time - a medication activity in event mood with the duration reflecting when the medication started and stopped. Ongoing medications will not have a stop date (or will have a stop date with a suitable NULL value). Ambulatory medication lists will generally also have a frequency (e.g., a medication is being taken twice a day). Inpatient medications generally record each administration as a separate act. The dose (doseQuantity) represents how many of the consumables are to be administered at each administration event. As a result, the dose is always relative to the consumable and the interval of administration. Thus, a patient consuming a single "metoprolol 25mg tablet" per administration will have a doseQuantity of "1", whereas a patient consuming "metoprolol" will have a dose of "25 mg".

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7499, CONF:1098-10504, CONF:1098-32498 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medication Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1098-7506)
Note: SubstanceAdministration.code is an optional field. Per HL7 Pharmacy Committee, "this is intended to further specify the nature of the substance administration act. To date the committee has made no use of this attribute". Because the type of substance administration is generally implicit in the routeCode, in the consumable participant, etc., the field is generally not used, and there is no defined value set.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7507), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32360)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-7555)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7514)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] doseQuantity (CONF:1098-7516)
b. Pre-coordinated consumable: If the consumable code is a pre-coordinated unit dose (e.g. "metoprolol 25mg tablet") then doseQuantity is a unitless number that indicates the number of products given per administration (e.g. "2", meaning 2 x "metoprolol 25mg tablet" per administration) (CONF:1098-16878).
c. Not pre-coordinated consumable: If the consumable code is not pre-coordinated (e.g. is simply "metoprolol"), then doseQuantity must represent a physical quantity with @unit, e.g. "25" and "mg", specifying the amount of product given per administration (CONF:1098-16879).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdministrationUnitDoseForm 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1021.30 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7519)
contain zero or one [0..1] text

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31150)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7536, CONF:1098-7537, CONF:1098-16087)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7539, CONF:1098-7540, CONF:1098-31387)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7543, CONF:1098-7547, CONF:1098-16089)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7549, CONF:1098-7553, CONF:1098-16090)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Dispense2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7552, CONF:1098-7544, CONF:1098-16091)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-30820, CONF:1098-30821, CONF:1098-30822)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Drug Monitoring Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.123)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31515, CONF:1098-31516, CONF:1098-31519)
The following entryRelationship is used to indicate a given medication's order in a series. The nested Substance Administered Act identifies an administration in the series. The entryRelationship/sequenceNumber shows the order of this particular administration in that series.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Substance Administered Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.118)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1098-31520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1098-31882)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1098-31883)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1098-7520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information2 (CONF:1098-16085)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32907, CONF:1098-32908, CONF:1098-32909)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Free Text Sig (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.147)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7542)
Medication Activity (V2) SHOULD include doseQuantity OR rateQuantity (CONF:1098-30800)
entryRelationship with target entry Substance Administered Act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-31517)
entryRelationship with target entry Substance Administered Act MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1098-31518)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:1098-7508)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:1098-32776)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:1098-32777)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:1098-7513, CONF:1098-28499)
If an effectiveTime is present with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or @xsi:type="TS", this effectiveTime SHALL contain either a low or a @value but not both (CONF:1098-32890)
SHALL conform to Medication Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7496, R2.0=CONF:1098-7496)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:7497, R2.0=CONF:1098-7497)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7500, R2.0=CONF:1098-7500)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1098-7506)
Note: SubstanceAdministration.code is an optional field. Per HL7 Pharmacy Committee, "this is intended to further specify the nature of the substance administration act. To date the committee has made no use of this attribute". Because the type of substance administration is generally implicit in the routeCode, in the consumable participant, etc., the field is generally not used, and there is no defined value set.
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7507), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32360)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-7555)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7514)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (Site), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:7515, R2.0=CONF:1098-7515)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] doseQuantity (CONF:1098-7516)
b. Pre-coordinated consumable: If the consumable code is a pre-coordinated unit dose (e.g. "metoprolol 25mg tablet") then doseQuantity is a unitless number that indicates the number of products given per administration (e.g. "2", meaning 2 x "metoprolol 25mg tablet" per administration) (CONF:1098-16878).
c. Not pre-coordinated consumable: If the consumable code is not pre-coordinated (e.g. is simply "metoprolol"), then doseQuantity must represent a physical quantity with @unit, e.g. "25" and "mg", specifying the amount of product given per administration (CONF:1098-16879).
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517, R2.0=CONF:1098-7517)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity (Dose Restriction) (CONF:7518, R2.0=CONF:1098-7518)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AdministrationUnitDoseForm 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1021.30 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7519)

MAY contain [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:7522, R2.0=CONF:1098-7522)
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:7523, CONF:16086, R2.0=CONF:1098-7523, R2.0=CONF:1098-16086)
Conforms to Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31150)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7536, CONF:1098-7537, CONF:1098-16087)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7539, CONF:1098-7540, CONF:1098-31387)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7543, CONF:1098-7547, CONF:1098-16089)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Supply Order2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17:2014-06-09)

Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Medication Dispense2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7552, CONF:1098-7544, CONF:1098-16091)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Drug Monitoring Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.123)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31515, CONF:1098-31516, CONF:1098-31519)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Substance Administered Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.118)
The following entryRelationship is used to indicate a given medication's order in a series. The nested Substance Administered Act identifies an administration in the series. The entryRelationship/sequenceNumber shows the order of this particular administration in that series.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1098-31520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1098-31882)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1098-31883)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1098-7520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information2 (CONF:1098-16085)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32907, CONF:1098-32908, CONF:1098-32909)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Conforms to Medication Free Text Sig (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.147)
Medication Activity SHOULD include doseQuantity OR rateQuantity (CONF:7529)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15977)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15978)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15979)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:7508)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:7511)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high (CONF:7512)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="TS", SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:NEW, R2.0=CONF:1098-32775)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:7513, CONF:9105)
effectiveTime with @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @operator="A" (CONF:9106, R2.0=CONF:1098-9106)

doseQuantity, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UCUM Units of Measure (case sensitive) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7526, R2.0=CONF:1098-7526)
participant with target entry Drug Vehicle SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:7524, R2.0=CONF:1098-7524)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7542)

rateQuantity, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7525, R2.0=CONF:1098-7525)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7542)
Medication Activity (V2) SHOULD include doseQuantity OR rateQuantity (CONF:1098-30800)
entryRelationship with target entry Substance Administered Act SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" (CONF:1098-31517)
entryRelationship with target entry Substance Administered Act MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sequenceNumber (CONF:1098-31518)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:1098-7508)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] low (CONF:1098-32776)
If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:1098-32777)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:1098-7513, CONF:1098-28499)
If an effectiveTime is present with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or @xsi:type="TS", this effectiveTime SHALL contain either a low or a @value but not both (CONF:1098-32890)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7499, CONF:10504 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16"
Consol Medication Activity Medication Activity SHOULD include doseQuantity OR rateQuantity (CONF:7529)
Consol Medication Activity text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15977)
Consol Medication Activity reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15978)
Consol Medication Activity reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:15979)
Consol Medication Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="IVL_TS" or contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type="TS" (CONF:7508)
Consol Medication Activity If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low (CONF:7511)
Consol Medication Activity If effectiveTime @xsi:type="IVL_TS", SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high (CONF:7512)
Consol Medication Activity If effectiveTime @xsi:type="TS", SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @value (CONF:NEW, R2.0=CONF:1098-32775)
Consol Medication Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:7513, CONF:9105)
Consol Medication Activity effectiveTime with @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @operator="A" (CONF:9106, R2.0=CONF:1098-9106)

Consol Medication Activity doseQuantity, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UCUM Units of Measure (case sensitive) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7526, R2.0=CONF:1098-7526)

Consol Medication Activity participant with target entry Drug Vehicle SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:7524, R2.0=CONF:1098-7524)
Consol Medication Activity entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7542)

Consol Medication Activity rateQuantity, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7525, R2.0=CONF:1098-7525)
SHALL conform to CDA Substance Administration
Consol Medication Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7496, R2.0=CONF:1098-7496)

Consol Medication Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:7497, R2.0=CONF:1098-7497)
Consol Medication Activity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7500, R2.0=CONF:1098-7500)
Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (Delivery Method) (CONF:7506)
Consol Medication Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7507)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (Route), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:7514)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode (Site), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:7515, R2.0=CONF:1098-7515)
Consol Medication Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (Dose) (CONF:7516)
Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517, R2.0=CONF:1098-7517)
Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity (Dose Restriction) (CONF:7518, R2.0=CONF:1098-7518)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode (Product Form), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Product Form Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.11 DYNAMIC (CONF:7519)
Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..1] performer such that it (CONF:7522, R2.0=CONF:1098-7522) Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Patient Instructions) such that it (CONF:7539, CONF:7540, CONF:16088) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Order Information) such that it (CONF:7543, CONF:7547, CONF:16089) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Reaction) such that it (CONF:7552, CONF:7544, CONF:16091) Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS, and Conforms to Reaction Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7536, CONF:7537, CONF:16087) Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON, and Conforms to Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship (Fulfillment Instructions) such that it (CONF:7549, CONF:7553, CONF:16090) Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR, and Conforms to Medication Dispense (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18)

Consol Medication Activity MAY contain [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:7523, CONF:16086, R2.0=CONF:1098-7523, R2.0=CONF:1098-16086) Conforms to Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)
Consol Medication Activity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (Free Text Sig) (CONF:7501)
Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:7555)
Consol Medication Activity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (Medication Information), where its type is Consumable (CONF:7520)
Consol Medication Activity MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition, where its type is Precondition (CONF:7546)
SHALL conform to CDA Consumable
Consol Consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information (CONF:16085)
SHALL conform to CDA Precondition
Consol Precondition SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:7550)
Consol Precondition SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration (CONF:16092)
